summary: We testified about the challenges the U.S. Coast Guard faces managing its aging shore infrastructure—its piers, boat stations, runways, etc.—almost half of which is beyond its service life. In our prior work , we found the Coast Guard took steps to make its shore infrastructure more resilient, helping to reduce its vulnerability to natural disasters. However, we also found that the Coast Guard didn't provide...
title: Coast Guard: Actions Needed to Better Manage Shore Infrastructure
